class_d_06_language_01:
My dear friends! How ARE you all today? I hope
you are doing MARVELOUSLY well![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_02:
It’s time for another of Salvatore’s Language
Lessons! Êtes-vous prêts—are you ready?![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_03:
I would expect no less from my excellent friends!
Even your replies to my questions are excellent![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_04:
Aujourd’hui—today—we will once again be
focusing on listening![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_05: Vas-y—go for it, my assistant! Pika pi, Pikachu![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_06:
As you may remember from our last class,
the same Pokémon’s cries may sound different\r
depending on what it wants to say![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_07:
Aujourd’hui—today, that is—we will be learning
more about the language used by Pokémon![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_08: Je t’en prie—if you would be so kind, Pikachu![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_09:
Hmmm! That sounds a little bleak, doesn’t it? Its
voice seems a little lower pitched, too![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_10:
What emotion do you suppose Pikachu was
trying to convey just now?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_answer_01:

perhaps,\r

class_d_06_language_15:
It’s expressing sadness! Kind of makes you want
to cry, doesn’t it?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_16:
That’s right—I had my little Pikachu cry as if it
was...crying! Haha! Funny joke, right?[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_17:
Don’t you think it did a great job? Give Pikachu
a round of applause, everyone![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_18:
And now, apropos of nothing, let me give you
all one of my wise words of advice![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_19:
If you hear one of your Pokémon making sad
noises like this one, you should treat them with\r
even more kindness than usual.[VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_20:
Well, you probably already knew that, though! A
piece of cake for you all, I’m sure![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_21:
Of course, this goes for your classmates and
others as well![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_22:
Friends should support each other in times of
sadness! I truly hope that you all can have smiles\r
on your faces all the time, my friends![VAR 0114(0026)]
class_d_06_language_23:
Our prochain cours—next lesson, that is—will be
our final lesson together! I hope you’re ready for\r
the climactic finale! Adios! Mata ne![VAR 0114(0026)]
